name: Probable Suspect
description: A simple murder mystery game where you question probabilistically generated witnesses. You then choose a suspect who probably commited a murder using probable cause.

name: Demo Project
description: This is a demo project to show you how the project grid works as well as how listed unreleased projects are handled.
